name: Rot Splatation
description:
Exploration game and interactive music visualizer accompanying my self-titled EP. Run around, look at things, meet cool new friends.

  • Controls: Mouse & WASD
  • Estimated play time: 15 minutes
  • Flashing lights

Let me know what you think.

The EP is out next Friday:
https://darkrealdark.bandcamp.com/album/halber-ball-halber-ball-ep
